description:
This is not a crashing bug, but it does generate an exception in compute and messes up the instance state until an unpause is done.

Something funky with the eventlet LoopingCall mechanism

The exception:
http://paste.openstack.org/show/389/
title: Pausing a Paused instance via OS API causes error
